content: 🦕 RAWR!! The Dinosaur update has crashed onto Shell Shockers! Enjoy the amazing new items!
📱 The Massive Mobile Update is here! Download today and see the improvements!
⛹🏼‍♂️ The Basket Bros Update is here! Ballin' Skins, Awesome VIP shotgun, map movements and more!
❤️ We support and stand with the people of Ukraine - introducing new Ukraine items and fundraiser!
🐓 King of the Coop is here!!!! Try the new game mode, new hats, new map OH MY!  💥
👑Introducing the VIP Club. Join  for as little as $5 per month with 2 premium items, no ads, x2 eggs and more!
💥 Wishlist our latest Cybertronic Synthwave shooter - Nuke Zone!
👨‍💼 Jump in the Merc Zone now - Slide and shoot to victory!
🗺️ Try our block building MMO Castles.cc & earn Level 4 to receive an awesome in-game Shell Shockers item!
